responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "705C2A514E029B06DEDF29B2A488EE35", "P.13.Month and Day: Aly has discovered an old tome belonging to our ancestor Connil. He thinks it a bible of sorts. Isa, being a former theologist, has agreed to help him decipher its meaning. They spend hours together in this endeavor, often scouring the ruined libraries nearby. I would accompany them, but someone must manage the estate.")
name: MADD_0012_RWS_RodericsDiary13Page_3
